item.title: HOW UNIVERSITIES FIT INTO THE PARIS CLIMATE AGREEMENT
item.description:
HOW UNIVERSITIES FIT INTO THE PARIS CLIMATE AGREEMENT

A landmark agreement to cut the world’s reliance on fossil fuels and thus slow the pace of global warming presents an important opportunity for universities, says Griffith University’s Professor Brendan Mackey.

item.title: GIVING A CRAP: SANITATION A BASIC FUNCTION BUT A COMPLEX ISSUE
item.description:
GIVING A CRAP: SANITATION A BASIC FUNCTION BUT A COMPLEX ISSUE

Know More:Centre for Population and Environmental Health

In most situations and places, toilets and defecation are taboo topics for discussion. They are at the bottom of the list of topics for dinner table conversations.
